mapper.select: select id, dl_number, dl_date, customerid, wid, dl_ysje, dl_ssje, dl_qkje,dl_zonje, dl_yhje, agent_id, admin, dl_type_id, dl_statie_id, dl_beizhu from projects.xsdocument_list where id = #{id}

SELECT id, dl_number, dl_date, customerid, wid, dl_ysje, dl_ssje, dl_qkje,dl_zonje, dl_yhje,v.`v_type_ck`, agent_id, admin, dl_type_id, dl_statie_id, dl_beizhu FROM projects.xsdocument_list dl LEFT JOIN customer c ON dl.`customerid` = c.c_id LEFT JOIN vip_type v ON c.v_type_id = v.v_type_id WHERE dl_number = #{dlnumber}
select id, dl_number, dl_date, customerid, wid, dl_ysje, dl_ssje, dl_qkje, dl_yhje, agent_id, admin, dl_type_id, dl_statie_id, dl_beizhu from projects.xsdocument_list limit #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT dm.branchid,dl.dl_number,dm.branchname,dl.dl_date,sl.c_contacts,v.`v_type_ck`,ws.wid,ws.wname,dl.dl_ysje,dl.dl_ssje,dl.dl_qkje,dl.dl_yhje,dl.dl_zonje,ag.agent_name,su.user_name,dls.dl_statie_name,dl.dl_beizhu FROM xsdocument_list dl LEFT JOIN customer sl ON dl.customerid = sl.c_id LEFT JOIN warehouse ws ON dl.wid = ws.wid LEFT JOIN agent ag ON dl.agent_id = ag.agent_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON dl.admin = su.user_id LEFT JOIN xsdocument_list_static dls ON dl.dl_statie_id = dls.dl_statie_id LEFT JOIN branch dm ON dm.branchid = sl.branchid LEFT JOIN vip_type v ON v.`v_type_id` = sl.`v_type_id`
dl.dl_statie_id = 1
AND dl.dl_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dlNumber},'%')
AND sl.c_contacts LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contacts},'%')
AND ws.wname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wname},'%')
AND ag.agent_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{agentname},'%')
AND su.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{username},'%')
AND dlt.dl_type_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dltypename},'%')
AND dls.dl_statie_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dlstatiename},'%')
AND dl.dl_beizhu LIKE CONCAT('%',#{dlbeizhu},'%')
AND dm.branchname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{branchname},'%')
ORDER BY dl.dl_date DESC

SELECT dm.branchid,dl.dl_number,dm.branchname,dl.dl_date,sl.c_contacts,v.`v_type_ck`,ws.wname,dl.dl_ysje,dl.dl_ssje,dl.dl_qkje,dl.dl_yhje,dl.dl_zonje,ag.agent_name,su.user_name,dls.dl_statie_name,dl.dl_beizhu FROM xsdocument_list dl LEFT JOIN customer sl ON dl.customerid = sl.c_id LEFT JOIN warehouse ws ON dl.wid = ws.wid LEFT JOIN agent ag ON dl.agent_id = ag.agent_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON dl.admin = su.user_id LEFT JOIN xsdocument_list_static dls ON dl.dl_statie_id = dls.dl_statie_id LEFT JOIN branch dm ON dm.branchid = sl.branchid LEFT JOIN vip_type v ON v.`v_type_id` = sl.`v_type_id` where (dl.dl_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') and dl.dl_statie_id = 1) or (sl.c_contacts LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') and dl.dl_statie_id = 1) or (ws.wname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{text},'%') and dl.dl_statie_id = 1)

SELECT dm.branchid,dl.dl_number,dm.branchname,dl.dl_date,sl.c_contacts,v.`v_type_ck`,ws.wname,dl.dl_ysje,dl.dl_ssje,dl.dl_qkje,dl.dl_yhje,dl.dl_zonje,ag.agent_name,su.user_name,dls.dl_statie_name,dl.dl_beizhu FROM xsdocument_list dl LEFT JOIN customer sl ON dl.customerid = sl.c_id LEFT JOIN warehouse ws ON dl.wid = ws.wid LEFT JOIN agent ag ON dl.agent_id = ag.agent_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON dl.admin = su.user_id LEFT JOIN xsdocument_list_static dls ON dl.dl_statie_id = dls.dl_statie_id LEFT JOIN branch dm ON dm.branchid = sl.branchid LEFT JOIN vip_type v ON v.`v_type_id` = sl.`v_type_id` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(dl.dl_date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{param1},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{param2},'%Y-%m-%d') and dl.dl_statie_id = 1 ORDER BY dl.dl_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into projects.xsdocument_list(dl_number, dl_date, customerid, wid,branchid, dl_ysje, dl_ssje, dl_qkje, dl_yhje,dl_zonje, agent_id, admin, dl_type_id, dl_statie_id, dl_beizhu) values (#{dlNumber}, #{dlDate}, #{customerid}, #{wid},#{branchid}, #{dlYsje}, #{dlSsje}, #{dlQkje}, #{dlYhje},#{dlzonje}, #{agentId}, #{admin}, #{dlTypeId}, #{dlStatieId}, #{dlBeizhu})

insert into projects.xsdocument_list(dl_number, dl_date, customerid, wid, dl_ysje, dl_ssje, dl_qkje, dl_yhje, agent_id, admin, dl_type_id, dl_statie_id, dl_beizhu) values
(#{entity.dlNumber}, #{entity.dlDate}, #{entity.customerid}, #{entity.wid}, #{entity.dlYsje}, #{entity.dlSsje}, #{entity.dlQkje}, #{entity.dlYhje}, #{entity.agentId}, #{entity.admin}, #{entity.dlTypeId}, #{entity.dlStatieId}, #{entity.dlBeizhu})

insert into projects.xsdocument_list(dl_number, dl_date, customerid, wid, dl_ysje, dl_ssje, dl_qkje, dl_yhje, agent_id, admin, dl_type_id, dl_statie_id, dl_beizhu) values
(#{entity.dlNumber}, #{entity.dlDate}, #{entity.customerid}, #{entity.wid}, #{entity.dlYsje}, #{entity.dlSsje}, #{entity.dlQkje}, #{entity.dlYhje}, #{entity.agentId}, #{entity.admin}, #{entity.dlTypeId}, #{entity.dlStatieId}, #{entity.dlBeizhu})
on duplicate key update dl_number = values(dl_number) , dl_date = values(dl_date) , customerid = values(customerid) , wid = values(wid) , dl_ysje = values(dl_ysje) , dl_ssje = values(dl_ssje) , dl_qkje = values(dl_qkje) , dl_yhje = values(dl_yhje) , agent_id = values(agent_id) , admin = values(admin) , dl_type_id = values(dl_type_id) , dl_statie_id = values(dl_statie_id) , dl_beizhu = values(dl_beizhu)
mapper.update:
update projects.xsdocument_list
dl_number = #{dlNumber},
dl_date = #{dlDate},
customerid = #{customerid},
wid = #{wid},
branchid = #{branchid},
dl_ysje = #{dlYsje},
dl_ssje = #{dlSsje},
dl_qkje = #{dlQkje},
dl_yhje = #{dlYhje},
dl_zonje = #{dlzonje},
agent_id = #{agentId},
admin = #{admin},
dl_type_id = #{dlTypeId},
dl_statie_id = #{dlStatieId},
dl_beizhu = #{dlBeizhu},
where dl_number = #{dlNumber}
update xsdocument_list set,dl_type_id = 1, dl_statie_id = 2,dl_qkje = #{dlQkje},dl_ssje= #{dlSsje},dl_ysje=#{dlYsje},dl_zonje=#{dlzonje} where dl_number = #{dlNumber}
